Name: Chilcano de Pisco
Ingredients: 60 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Pisco and ginger ale made more interesting by a splash of lime juice and a few dashes of Amargo Chuncho bitters.
History: The Chilcano de Pisco is a traditional Peruvian way of serving pisco. Its name should not be confused with the Peruvian fish soup, Chilcano de Pescado, although the drink derived its name from the dish due to the similarity in hue thanks to the colouring effect of the aromatic bitters.
Nutrition: One serving of Chilcano de Pisco contains 132 calories
